keys_responses.admission: For information on admissions, please visit our Admissions Office or check our website for details on application deadlines, requirements, and procedures.
keys_responses.student_service: Our Student Services team is here to help you with academic advising, career counseling, and personal support. Visit our office or contact us via email for assistance.
keys_responses.student_clubs: We have a variety of student clubs and organizations for you to join, ranging from academic societies to cultural and recreational groups. Visit our Student Activities Office to learn more.
keys_responses.library: The library is open from 9 AM to 9 PM. You can access a wide range of books, journals, and digital resources to support your studies.
keys_responses.courses: You can explore our course offerings and register for classes on the university website. For detailed course information, visit the Course Catalog section.
keys_responses.coffee: The campus coffee bar is open from 8 AM to 8 PM. It's the perfect place to grab a coffee and relax between classes.
keys_responses.residence: Information about student housing can be found on our website. We offer a range of on-campus and off-campus housing options to suit your needs.
keys_responses.other_department: For information about other departments, please visit the university website or contact the relevant department office directly.

other_responses: What else would you like me to do for you?
Hmm, I'd love to hear more about that.
